description: The CP210x USB to UART Bridge Virtual COM Port (VCP) drivers are required for device operation as a Virtual COM Port to facilitate host communication with [CP210x](https://www.silabs.com/products/interface/usb-bridges) products.  This package is compatible only with Windows 10 or later and will fail on older Windows versions.
displayName: CP210x USB to UART Bridge VCP Drivers Windows 10 Universal (Install)
summary: This package provides Virtual COM Port driver for CP210x devices on Windows 10 devices
author: Silicon Laboratories
